mapper.insert: insert into QRTZ_TRIGGERS (TRIGGER_GROUP, TRIGGER_NAME, JOB_NAME, JOB_GROUP, IS_VOLATILE, DESCRIPTION, NEXT_FIRE_TIME, PREV_FIRE_TIME, PRIORITY, TRIGGER_STATE, TRIGGER_TYPE, START_TIME, END_TIME, CALENDAR_NAME, MISFIRE_INSTR, JOB_DATA) values (#{triggerGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{triggerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isVolatile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextFireTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prevFireTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{priority,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{triggerState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{triggerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{endTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{calendarName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{misfireInstr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{jobData,jdbcType=BLOB})

mapper.update:
update QRTZ_TRIGGERS
TRIGGER_GROUP = #{record.triggerGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRIGGER_NAME = #{record.triggerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOB_NAME = #{record.jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOB_GROUP = #{record.jobGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_VOLATILE = #{record.isVolatile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEXT_FIRE_TIME = #{record.nextFireTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PREV_FIRE_TIME = #{record.prevFireTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRIORITY = #{record.priority,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRIGGER_STATE = #{record.triggerState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRIGGER_TYPE = #{record.triggerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_TIME = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
END_TIME = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CALENDAR_NAME = #{record.calendarName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MISFIRE_INSTR = #{record.misfireInstr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JOB_DATA = #{record.jobData,jdbcType=BLOB},

update QRTZ_TRIGGERS set TRIGGER_GROUP = #{record.triggerGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIGGER_NAME = #{record.triggerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOB_NAME = #{record.jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOB_GROUP = #{record.jobGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_VOLATILE = #{record.isVolatile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEXT_FIRE_TIME = #{record.nextFireTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PREV_FIRE_TIME = #{record.prevFireTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRIORITY = #{record.priority,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRIGGER_STATE = #{record.triggerState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIGGER_TYPE = #{record.triggerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_TIME = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, END_TIME = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CALENDAR_NAME = #{record.calendarName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MISFIRE_INSTR = #{record.misfireInstr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, JOB_DATA = #{record.jobData,jdbcType=BLOB}

update QRTZ_TRIGGERS
JOB_NAME = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOB_GROUP = #{jobGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_VOLATILE = #{isVolatile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEXT_FIRE_TIME = #{nextFireTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PREV_FIRE_TIME = #{prevFireTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRIGGER_STATE = #{triggerState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRIGGER_TYPE = #{triggerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CALENDAR_NAME = #{calendarName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MISFIRE_INSTR = #{misfireInstr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JOB_DATA = #{jobData,jdbcType=BLOB},
where TRIGGER_GROUP = #{triggerGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and TRIGGER_NAME = #{triggerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
